page.title: ServerlessDays Cardiff 2025 - Home
page.description: One Day. One Track. One Community. ServerlessDays Cardiff is coming soon

eventDetails.name: Cardiff
eventDetails.tagline: One Day. One Track. One Community

speakers.text: We are excited to bring a number of incredible speakers to Cardiff to share their stories on a range of topics. Although serverless is a theme that will run throughout the day, with recent seismic changes in the software industry, we want to hear about the impact of generative AI, digital sovereignty, cloud financial management and cloud security amongst other themes. We hope to announce speakers following the call for papers covering a variety of areas on different cloud providers.

agenda.name: Networking and Drinks - the venue will stay open till 22:00

venue.text:
After the success of the 2024 edition, ServerlessDays Cardiff will once again be held in the DEPOT 
 
**Location:** DEPOT, Unit 8 Curran Road (Off Dumballs Road), Cardiff, CF10 5DF
